justification: Vendor 3 details a 'robust instance repository' explicitly for 'storing the runtime state of Digital Twin assets' including telemetry, configuration, and state information, and supports 'retrieval' through integration interfaces. Real-time accuracy and standards adherence are mentioned. However, while storage and retrieval are described, explicit details on comprehensive management capabilities (e.g., versioning or lifecycle management) are not directly stated.
ability: The ability to store, manage and retrieve digital twin instance data that conforms to the requirements of the digital twin model
